nodes.text: A dragon-like reptile found in the deserts of Tatooine was a dangerous burrowing reptile that had a long body with brown skin, an elongated snout with long sharp teeth, and red eyes. It would emerge above ground and snap its jaws at prey that passed by.

Unnamed in the game or its manual, these creatures were referred to as "dragons" and a "dragon-like enemies" in a Nintendo Power magazine article detailing the Super Star Wars: Return of the Jedi video game.
